text: yaayyuha alladhina amanu kutiba ʿalaykumu l-qisasu fi l-qatla l-huru bil-huri wal-ʿabdu bil-ʿabdi wal-untha bil-untha faman ʿufiya lahu min akhihi shayon fa-ittibaʿun bil-maʿrufi wa-adaon ilayhi bi-ih'sanin dhalika takhfifun min rabbikum warahmatun famani iʿ'tada baʿda dhalika falahu ʿadhabun alimun
